responsibilities.content: Designed and developed multiple in-house and corporate web applications using Power Applications, Power Automate, and Dataverse to streamline business processes and improve efficiency.
Experienced in managing and maintaining SharePoint sites for document storage, team collaboration, and workflow automation.
Managed and maintained IT hardware, software, and network equipment for the organization.
Configured and deployed Fortinet Firewalls and Synology Drive for secure and efficient network storage solutions.
Automated critical tasks using Power Automate, such as integrating daily attendance records (from ZKTeco Biometrics) directly into the payroll system database.
Created monthly assessment reports detailing hardware, software, and network performance improvements.
Advanced knowledge of Fortinet Firewall and Synology Network Storage.

Extensive experience in managing Office 365 environments, including Domain integration and configuration, Security Groups and Distribution List management, Email flow and rule setup using Microsoft Exchange.
Assisted in troubleshooting and resolving hardware, software, and network-related issues for internal users.
Provided technical support for the installation, configuration, and maintenance of IT equipment and applications.
Monitored and maintained network infrastructure to ensure minimal downtime and optimal performance.
Performed routine diagnostics and maintenance tasks on computer systems and peripherals.
Documented technical issues and resolutions, contributing to a knowledge base for future troubleshooting.
Collaborated with senior engineers to learn and implement advanced IT solutions.
